title: ETSI Domain: Creative Media
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: etsi-domain-creative-media-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: 20340
	- preferred-term:: ETSI Domain: Creative Media
	- status:: draft
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Domain marker for ETSI metaverse categorization covering creative content production, 3D modeling, rendering, and multimedia authoring for virtual environments.
	- source:: [[ETSI GR MEC 032]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: mv:ETSIDomain_CreativeMedia
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: mv:VirtualObject
	- owl:functional-syntax:: true
	- belongsToDomain:: [[InfrastructureDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[ApplicationLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: etsi-domain-creative-media-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Metaverse]]
		- is-part-of:: [[ETSI Metaverse Domain Taxonomy]]
		- has-part:: [[Asset Management]]
		- has-part:: [[Rendering Pipeline]]
		- has-part:: [[3D Content Creation]]
		- has-part:: [[Multimedia Authoring]]
		- requires:: [[Creative Tools]]
		- requires:: [[Content Pipeline]]
		- enables:: [[Virtual World Building]]
		- enables:: [[Avatar Customization]]
		- enables:: [[Scene Design]]
		- depends-on:: [[Graphics Processing]]
		- depends-on:: [[Asset Format Standards]]

ontology.definition: Domain marker for ETSI metaverse categorization covering creative content production, 3D modeling, rendering, and multimedia authoring for virtual environments.
